snippet: With injuries mounting, Boston's manager, Bobby Valentine, has trotted out some less-than-household names onto the tradition-rich turf of Fenway Park.
abstract: With injuries mounting, Boston's manager, Bobby Valentine, has trotted out some less-than-household names onto the tradition-rich turf of Fenway Park.

headline.main: On Anonymous Red Sox, Only the Issues Stand Out
headline.print_headline: On Anonymous Red Sox, Only Questions Stand Out
